entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains near noon. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
